result.eng: I got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ga: fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.orig: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.html: fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ponchtml: fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taiṫí a ḃí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.

result.eng: I'm not used to alcohol much.
result.ga: níl mórán taithí agam ar an alcól
result.orig: Níl mórán taithí agam ar an alcól
result.html: níl mórán taithí agam ar an alcólI'm not used to alcohol much.
result.ponchtml: níl mórán taiṫí agam ar an alcólI'm not used to alcohol much.

result.eng: He wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ga: theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na heorpa
result.orig: Theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na hEorpa
result.html: theastaigh uaidh dul i dtaithí ar chultúr na heorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.
result.ponchtml: ṫeastaiġ uaiḋ dul i dtaiṫí ar ċultúr na heorpaHe wanted to familiarize himself with European culture.

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: He found another person who had flying experience.
result.ga: d'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.orig: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.html: d'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.
result.ponchtml: d'aimsiġ sé duine eile a raiḃ taiṫí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: d'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.html: d'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ponchtml: d'earcaiġ sé 15 duine eile naċ raiḃ mórán taiṫí acu aċ i ḃforéigean agus ċuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
